## adaptDPI variable

Sets the canvas size to given `width` &amp; `height` and adjusts style to compensate for HDPI devices. Note: For 2D canvases, this will automatically clear any prior canvas content.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
adaptDPI: (canvas: HTMLCanvasElement, width: number, height: number) => number
```
